annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: EN
annotations.translation: 英语

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: Official Journal of the European Union
annotations.translation: 欧盟官方公报

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: (Acts adopted pursuant to Title V of the Treaty on European Union)
annotations.translation: （根据《欧盟条约》第五章通过的法令）

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: COUNCIL COMMON POSITION 2003/495/CFSP
annotations.translation: 第 2003/495/CFSP 号理事会共同立场

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: of 7 July 2003

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: on Iraq and repealing Common Positions 96/741/CFSP and 2002/599/CFSP
annotations.translation: 关于伊拉克及废除第 96/741/CFSP 号和第 2002/599/CFSP 号共同立场

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 2
annotations.translation: 第 2 条

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION,
annotations.translation: 欧盟理事会，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Whereas:
annotations.translation: 鉴于：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to the Treaty on European Union, and in particular Article 15 thereof,
annotations.translation: 考虑到《欧盟条约》，特别是其中第 15 条，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (1) On 22 May 2003, the United Nations Security Council adopted Resolution 1483 (2003) repealing all prohibitions related to trade with Iraq and the provision of financial and economic resources to Iraq established by Security Council Resolution 661 (1990) and subsequent relevant resolutions including Resolution 778 (1992), with the exception of prohibitions related to the sale or supply to Iraq of arms and related material other than those arms and related material required by the United States of America and the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland as occupying powers under unified command (hereinafter called 'the Authority'), and imposing new measures.
annotations.translation: (1) 2003 年 5 月 22 日，联合国安全理事会通过了第 1483 (2003) 号决议，废除安全理事会第 661 (1990) 号决议及其后各项有关决议，包括第 778 (1992) 号决议，所规定的与伊拉克进行贸易和向伊拉克提供财政和经济资源的所有禁令，但禁止向伊拉克出售或供应军火和有关物资，美利坚合众国和大不列颠及北爱尔兰联合王国统一指挥下的占领国（以下简称“管理当局”）所需的军火和有关物资除外，并实施了新的措施。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (2) The Council welcomes the decision of the Security Council to lift sanctions against Iraq.
annotations.translation: (2) 理事会欢迎安全理事会解除对伊拉克制裁的决定。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (3) The Council welcomes the commitment of the Security Council and of the Authority, in Resolution 1483 (2003), to help reconstruct Iraq and to aid the Iraqi people in moving towards the establishment of an inter nationally recognised, representative Government.
annotations.translation: (3) 理事会欢迎安全理事会和管理当局在第 1483(2003) 号决议中承诺帮助重建伊拉克，并协助伊拉克人民逐步建立一个得到国际承认的有代表性的政府。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (4) Council Common Positions 96/741/CFSP (¹) and 2002/599/CFSP (²) should therefore be repealed.
annotations.translation: (4) 因此，应废除第 96/741/CFSP 号 (¹) 和 第 2002/599/CFSP 号 (²) 理事会共同立场。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (5) Action by the Community is needed in order to implement certain measures,
annotations.translation: (5) 需要共同体采取行动，以实施某些措施，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: HAS ADOPTED THIS COMMON POSITION:
annotations.translation: 已通过以下共同立场：

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 1
annotations.translation: 第 1 条

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The sale or supply to Iraq of arms and related material, other than those arms and related material required by the Authority to serve the purposes of Security Council Resolution 1483 (2003) and other related Security Council Resolutions, remains prohibited.
annotations.translation: 仍然禁止向伊拉克出售或供应武器和相关物资，但管理当局为安全理事会第 1483(2003) 号决议和安全理事会其他有关决议的目的所需的军火和相关物资除外。

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: Common Position 96/741/CFSP of 17 December 1996 defined by the Council on the basis of Article J.2 of the Treaty on European Union concerning the derogations from the embargo with regard to Iraq (OJ L 337, 27.12.1996, p. 5).
annotations.translation: 1996 年 12 月 17 日由理事会根据《欧洲联盟条约》 第 J.2 条确定的关于克减对伊拉克的禁运的第 96/741/CFSP 号共同立场（OJ L 337， 1996 年 12 月 27 日，第 5 页）。

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: Common Position 2002/599/CFSP of 22 July 2002 supplementing Common Position 96/741/CFSP concerning the derogations from the embargo with regard to Iraq (OJ L 194, 23.7.2002, p. 47).
annotations.translation: 2002 年 7 月 22 日第 2002/599/CFSP 号共同立场补充了关于克减对伊拉克禁运的第 96/741/CFSP 号共同立场（OJ L 194，2002 年 7 月 23 日，第 47 页）。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: All funds or other financial assets or economic resources:
annotations.translation: 所有资金或其他金融资产或经济资源：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) of the previous Government of Iraq or its State bodies, corporations, or agencies, located outside Iraq as of 22 May 2003 as designated by the Committee established pursuant to Security Council Resolution 661 (1990), or
annotations.translation: (a) 安全理事会第 661(1990) 号决议所设委员会指认的截至 2003 年 5 月 22 日位于伊拉克境外的伊拉克前政府或其国家机关、公司或机构，或

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) that have been removed from Iraq, or acquired by Saddam Hussein or other senior officials of the former Iraqi regime and their immediate family members, including entities owned or controlled directly or indirectly by them or by persons acting on their behalf or at their direction, as designated by the Committee established pursuant to Security Council Resolution 661 (1990),
annotations.translation: (b) 根据安全理事会第 661(1990) 号决议所设委员会指认的萨达姆·侯赛因或伊拉克前政权的其他高级官员及其直系亲属，包括由他们或代表他们或按他们指示行事的人直接或间接拥有或控制的实体从伊拉克运走的，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: shall be frozen without delay and, unless these funds or other financial assets or economic resources are themselves the subject of a prior judicial, administrative or arbitral lien or judgement, Member States shall immediately cause their transfer to the Development Fund for Iraq under the conditions set out in Security Council Resolution 1483 (2003).
annotations.translation: 应立即冻结，除非这些资金或其他金融资产或经济资源本身是先前司法、行政或仲裁留置权或裁决的对象，否则成员国应立即根据安全理事会第 1483 (2003) 号决议规定的条件将其转入伊拉克发展基金。

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 3
annotations.translation: 第 3 条

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: All appropriate steps will be taken to facilitate the safe return to Iraqi institutions of Iraqi cultural property and other items of archaeological, historical, cultural, rare scientific, and religious importance illegally removed from the Iraq National Museum, the National Library, and other locations in Iraq since the adoption of Security Council Resolution 661 (1990), including by establishing a prohibition on trade in or transfer of such items and items with respect to which reasonable suspicion exists that they have been illegally removed.
annotations.translation: 将采取一切适当步骤，促进自安全理事会第 661 (1990) 号决议通过以来从伊拉克国家博物馆、国家图书馆和伊拉克其他地点非法转移的伊拉克文化财产和其他考古、历史、 文化、稀有科学和宗教重要物品安全归还伊拉克机构，包括规定禁止此类物品以及有理由怀疑为被非法转移的物品的贸易或转让。
